sqlMap.select: SELECT STRATEGY_ID , STRATEGY_NM FROM BSC_STRATEGY WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND DELETE_DT IS NULL ORDER BY SORT_ORDER
SELECT STRATEGY_ID , STRATEGY_NM FROM BSC_STRATEGY WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND STRATEGY_ID = #findStrategyId# AND DELETE_DT IS NULL ORDER BY SORT_ORDER

SELECT A.CSF_ID, A.CSF_NM FROM BSC_CSF A WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.CSF_ID IN (SELECT CSF_ID FROM BSC_METRIC WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND STRATEGY_ID = #findStrategyId# AND CSF_ID IS NOT NULL AND DELETE_DT IS NULL) AND A.DELETE_DT IS NULL ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER

SELECT A.YEAR , A.METRIC_ID , A.METRIC_NM , A.CSF_ID , A.SC_DEPT_ID , B.SC_DEPT_NM , B.UP_SC_DEPT_ID , B.LEVEL_ID , A.STRATEGY_ID , D.STRATEGY_NM , C.TARGET , C.ACTUAL , C.SCORE , C.FINAL_SCORE , C.STATUS , E.COLOR FROM BSC_METRIC A INNER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.SC_DEPT_ID = B.SC_DEPT_ID AND B.DELETE_DT IS NULL LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_METRICSCORE C ON A.YEAR = C.YEAR AND C.MON = #findMon# AND C.ANAL_CYCLE = #findAnalCycle# AND A.METRIC_ID = C.METRIC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_STRATEGY D ON A.YEAR = D.YEAR AND A.STRATEGY_ID = D.STRATEGY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_COMMON_STATUS E ON A.YEAR = E.YEAR AND C.STATUS = E.STATUS_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.STRATEGY_ID = #findStrategyId# AND A.DELETE_DT IS NULL ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER
